thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 7 of 1877
thread.title: Mandy

author: Mandy
title: Mandy
text: I was pleased to have booked my trip to Liberia, Costa Rica today from Toronto, Canada. The website was easy to navigate and check out was a breeze. After searching long and hard, Flighthub definitely gave me the best price and shortest trip available. I chose the flexible dates option and with only a 2 day difference, I was able to save $340! Not only that, the flight was 8 hours shorter compared to other flights which I would of paid more for to begin with. So with a savings of $340, shorter flight, I am one happy camper and will definitely return! Thank you Flighthub!
